scenes.text:
Asian Soc is all about embracing and showcasing the Asian culture and traditions to Cardiff students whilst providing a welcoming and homely environment away from home. Through celebrations of major religious festivals, to casual dinners and socials, and our annual showcase event: Elements, we aim to provide a holistic experience for the student community.

Join the society and get plenty of opportunities to attend great events as well as meet a lot of new people.
Specific date and times for socials can be found on our SU page and our Facebook page.
Our membership is Â£4.95 for the year!

Our Main Events Include: 
Initi-Asian, Garba, Diwali & Eid Chandni Ball, Cardiff-Bristol-Southampton Bar Crawl, Go Global, Elements, and Holi.

There are also plenty of opportunities for students to not only showcase their talents but to also learn and progress in genres such as dancing, singing, playing instruments and even acting!
